content.title: 🎉 $1 Million Stretch Goal Unlocked—and a GIVEAWAY for you!
content.creator:
Circular
March 18, 2025
content.content:
Dear backers,

🎉  Big news! Circular Ring 2 smashed past $1,000,000 in funding! And we’re only getting started.
👉 To Celebrate: A Most-Wanted Stretch Goal is Here!
You asked, we delivered—Size 5 is officially unlocked! Now, even more people can experience the future of smart rings.
👉 Next Up: Blood Pressure Tracking at $1.5M!
We’re not stopping here. When we hit $1.5M, we’ll unlock blood pressure tracking as a part of your ring! This is a game-changer, and with your support, it’s within reach.
And here’s the kicker—two more surprise stretch goals are waiting at $2M and $2.5M. Trust us, you’ll want to see them unlocked.
🔥 Giveaway Alert: Win a Second Ring!
Want to score an extra Circular Ring 2? Here’s your chance!
💬 Join the conversation in the Kickstarter Discussions section!
Tell us which feature of Circular Ring 2 you’re most excited about.
  🔝 The comment with the most replies wins a FREE Circular Ring 2- be creative!
⏳ The giveaway runs for 5 days only—until March 22! We’ll review the results and announce the winner shortly after.
So, jump in and start the conversation—this one’s too good to miss! 🎉
🔗 Join the Conversation Now!
💰 Want to Earn Rewards? Join Our Kickbooster Program!
Join our Kickbooster affiliate program, share your unique link, and earn a commission for every successful pledge. Let’s work together to unlock all our stretch goals!
🔗 Join the Kickbooster Program & Start Earning!
🚀  Your support is what makes it possible to hit such milestones, and we can’t wait to bring even more to the table. Let’s unlock what’s next—together.
The Circular Team
Other Projects We Like
CINEMA//Series: World’s 1st Cinema-Grade Mobile Lens System
Experience true cinematic quality on mobile with CINEMA // Series, the world’s first commercial-grade lens system, co-developed by ShiftCam and TUSK for professional filmmakers. Built with fluorite crystal optics and precision-engineered coatings, it delivers unmatched sharpness, depth, and control—allowing you to shoot Hollywood-quality footage anywhere.
  7 Professional Lenses – Anamorphic, telephoto, macro, wide-angle & fisheye.
8 Cinematic Filters – ND, VND, Mist & CPL for total exposure control.
Fluorite Crystal Optics – Every element is fluorite crystal, delivering unmatched clarity, color accuracy & minimal distortion.
Advanced Multi-Layer Coating – Up to 98 layers per lens to reduce glare, enhance contrast & protect against wear.
Ultra-Low Chromatic Aberration – Eliminates color fringing for sharp, true-to-life visuals.
Quick-Mount S-System – Secure, tool-free lens swaps for a seamless shooting experience.
Get Yours Now!
Starship Pro: Pocket-Sized Power Bank with 210W Output
The Future Starship Pro is a compact yet ultra-powerful 10,000mAh power bank designed for fast, efficient, and uninterrupted charging, making it perfect for travel, work, and daily use.
210W Total Output: Facilitates fast and efficient charging for multiple devices
Dual 140W USB-C Ports: Capable of charging power-hungry devices like MacBooks, gaming laptops, and tablets at full speed
30-Minute Full Recharge: With a 90W (or higher) charger, the Future Starship Pro powers up in just 30 minutes
Compact Design: Portable and travel-friendly, making it convenient for on-the-go use
Airplane-Safe: Complies with airline safety standards for carry-on batteries
Get Now!
Planck: The World’s Smallest Phone-first SSD with up to 2TB
Meet Planck - The Most Powerful SSD for Its Size! It clicks straight onto your Phone, disappears in your palm as you record, and packs more power than you’d ever expect from a device so incredibly small!
Up to 2TB of storage
Fast 1050 MB/s transfer speeds
Unlocks Apple ProRes 4K 60/120 fps
Water & Dust Resistant
It’s time to change the  mobile content creation game.
Get yours now with up to 36% OFF.
Lemokey L5 HE 8K: The Ultimate Magnetic Gaming Keyboard
Lemokey L5 HE 8K combines top-grade specs with brilliant design, to revolutionize your gaming experience like never before!
Customizable Magnetic Switches
Full metal body
8000 Hz Polling Rate up to 32K Hz scan rate
0.01mm  actuation precision,
Dynamic rapid triggering
It’s the best 75% keyboard for gamers—centered around speed, precision, and durability.
Get Yours Now!
Looktech AI Glasses: The Smart Glasses That Truly Know You

Meet Looktech AI Glasses—your intelligent companion that’s always there for you. It remembers your preferences, routines, and grows with you. 
Get real-time AI assistance, capture memories, answer calls, and enjoy music—all hands-free.
Personalized AI Assistance
High-definition 13MP Camera
Hands-Free Control
14-hour battery life
Privacy-first design
Wide choice of lenses
Lightweight
Get Yours Now!

content.title: 🚀 Fully Funded in 4 Minutes—Thanks to You!
content.creator:
Circular
March 7, 2025
content.content:
Dear backers,

🚀 We can hardly believe it. Circular Ring 2 was fully funded in just 4 minutes. In just 40 minutes, we hit $100,000, and now we’re closing in on $400,000 in funding!
These results remind us why we never gave up.
❤️ To every single one of you who believed in us, who backed us, who made this moment possible—thank you. This isn’t just a milestone. It’s a testament to the trust you’ve placed in us, and that trust means the world.
✊ We poured five years into making Circular Ring 2 everything it was meant to be. And now, we’re more determined than ever to deliver the best, the smartest, the most reliable experience for you–becoming a part of your well-being.

👇 Our founders wanted to personally thank you for your incredible support in making this launch such a success. Watch their message and celebrate this milestone with us!
🙌 This is just the beginning. We can’t wait to show you what’s next.
With all our gratitude,
The Circular Team
